item.title: FileSystemRepository
item.description: Github Gitee WithWhat.DesignPattern 描述 文件仓储 用法 using UnityEngine; using WithWhat.Repository; public class RepositoryTest : MonoBehaviour { public class User { public string UserName; public string Password; } private FileSystemRepository<User> _fileSystemRepository; private void Awake() { var user = new User() { UserName = "张三", Password = "123" }; _fileSystemRepository.Insert(user); } }
